description: This is a Dart source file defining the EventStore class, which manages in-memory event data, provides CRUD operations, and maintains selected date state for a Flutter calendar app.

classes.name: EventStore
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing a list of Event objects, enabling CRUD operations, event filtering, and state management for calendar events.

methods.name: selectedDate
methods.description: Getter for the currently selected date.

methods.name: allEvents
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of all stored events.

methods.name: eventsForDate
methods.description: Returns a list of events occurring on a specific date, sorted by start time.

methods.name: eventCountByDay
methods.description: Provides a map of each date to the count of events on that date.

methods.name: selectDate
methods.description: Updates the selected date and notifies listeners.

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Adds a new event to the store and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Updates an existing event identified by id and notifies listeners.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Removes an event by id and notifies listeners.

methods.name: seedDemoEvents
methods.description: Populates the store with sample events for demo purposes.

methods.name: _stripDate
methods.description: Private static method to strip time components from a DateTime, leaving only year, month, and day.
